> I would think clamav would be an integral part of Debian

> up (old & stable into unstable & volatile), and not the other way

> and rkhunter, which is still saying the hdparm lines in my init scripts

debian-security has different goal. debian-volatile is here for this kind of 
issue. I hope new clamav will appear in next lenny update.
